description.value: Character selects either Ranged or Melee to represent "X" (affects requirements appropriately). When making attacks of type X that deal Critical Damage, they can add their Perception Bonus to the result.

system.benefit: Character selects either Ranged or Melee to represent "X" (affects requirements appropriately). When making attacks of type X that deal Critical Damage, they can add their Perception Bonus to the result.
